summary:
## Interpol: A Global Police Network

Interpol is the world's largest international police organization. It helps countries work together to fight crime, like terrorism, cybercrime, and organized crime. 

Founded in 1923, Interpol now has 196 member countries. It provides training, support, and databases to help police forces worldwide.

Despite its name, Interpol isn't a police force itself. Instead, it acts as a coordinator, ensuring countries can share information and work together.
title: Interpol
